dragonsurvival:config.category.general.t: General config options for Dragon Survival
ds.skill_cooldown_check_failure: The ability is not ready yet!
ds.dragon_altar_warning_text: after making your choice you will die, lose all progress and find yourself in an unknown place without any items.
ds.cave_dragon_choice: You have chosen to become a Cave dragon.
ds.forest_dragon_choice: You have chosen to become a Forest dragon.
ds.sea_dragon_choice: You have chosen to become a Sea dragon.
ds.choice_human: You have chosen to become a human.
ds.choice_already_human: You can't become a human as you are already a human.
ds.dragon.grants.wings: <Ender dragon> I bestow wings on you. Now get out of here
